name: neutered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an animal) having had part of its sexual organs removed, so that it cannot produce young animals: Every pit bull must be registered and neutered. Most of the sheep are neutered males. Compare
altered US
spayed
castrated
More examplesFewer examplesThe dogs, both male, are neutered.Many people believe that a neutered cat becomes lazy and overweight, but this is not the case.Two neutered male rabbits live side by side but fight as soon as they get together.The officers will check for documentation of spayed and neutered pets.
